Title: P0-Critical
Body: Red priority label for critical issues

Title: P1-High
Body: Orange priority label for high priority

Title: P2-Medium
Body: Yellow priority label for medium priority

Title: P3-Low
Body: Green priority label for low priority

Title: bug
Body: Something isn't working

Title: enhancement
Body: New feature or request

Title: documentation
Body: Improvements to documentation

Title: wip
Body: Work in progress

Title: blocked
Body: Issue is blocked by something

Title: ready-for-review
Body: PR is ready for review

Title: Add dark mode support
Body:
We need dark mode support for the UI. This is a highly requested feature from users.

Acceptance criteria:
- Toggle in settings
- Persist user preference
- Apply to all pages

Title: Fix login bug with special characters
Body:
Users with @ symbols in usernames cannot log in.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Try to login with user@example
2. See error

Expected: Should login successfully

Title: Update README with setup instructions
Body:
README is outdated. Need to add:
- Installation steps
- Environment variables
- Running tests

Title: Optimize database queries
Body: Dashboard is slow. Profile shows N+1 queries on user list page.\n\nNeed to add eager loading and proper indexes.

Title: Add unit tests for auth module
Body:
Auth module has no tests. Need to add:
- Login tests
- Registration tests
- Password reset tests

Title: Fix memory leak in background worker
Body: Background worker memory usage grows over time. Likely not releasing connections.\n\nMemory usage: 100MB -> 2GB over 24 hours

Title: Add API documentation
Body: Need to document all API endpoints with examples

Title: Implement file upload feature
Body:
Users need to upload files. Requirements:
- Max 10MB
- Support images and PDFs
- Virus scanning

Title: Fix broken links in footer
Body: Privacy policy and terms links return 404

Title: Add search functionality
Body: Need search bar in header to search issues and docs

Title: Add dark mode toggle
Body:
Implements dark mode toggle in settings page.

TODO:
- Add CSS variables
- Test on all pages
- Add persistence

Title: Fix login bug for special chars
Body:
Fixes #2 by properly escaping special characters in login form.

Tested with:
- user@example ✓
- user+test@example ✓
- user.name@example ✓

Title: Update README
Body:
Updates README with current setup instructions.

Adds:
- Docker setup
- Environment variables
- Testing guide

Title: Optimize database queries
Body:
Adds eager loading to user list queries.

Performance:
- Before: 2.3s
- After: 0.4s (82% improvement)

Still TODO: Add indexes

Title: Add auth unit tests
Body:
Adds comprehensive unit tests for auth module.

Coverage: 85%

Tests:
- Login (5 tests)
- Registration (4 tests)
- Password reset (3 tests)

Title: DATABASE_URL
Body: PostgreSQL connection string

Title: API_KEY
Body: Third-party API key

Title: JWT_SECRET
Body: Secret for JWT token signing

Title: SMTP_PASSWORD
Body: Email SMTP password

Title: NODE_ENV
Body: production

Title: LOG_LEVEL
Body: info

Body: First stable release with core features
